TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityStateEncoder extends System.Object

summary.span: 可以實作來編碼安全性狀態的抽象類別。

span.span: An abstract class that can be implemented to encode the security state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當所使用繫結具有的訊息安全性是使用具狀態的安全性內容權杖時，就會使用這個類別來編碼和解碼該安全性內容權杖的內容。This class is used to encode and decode the content of the security context token when a binding with message security that uses a stateful security context token is used. 如需有關具狀態的安全性內容權杖的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立安全工作階段的安全性內容權杖](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-security-context-token-for-a-secure-session.md)主題。For more information about stateful security context tokens, see [How to: Create a Security Context Token for a Secure Session](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-security-context-token-for-a-secure-session.md) topic. Microsoft 的 版本為 。Microsoft’s version of is . 它會使用 Microsoft [Windows 資料保護 (DPAPI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96704)技術來加密/解密 cookie。It uses Microsoft’s [Windows Data Protection (DPAPI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96704) technology to encrypt/decrypt the cookie. 您可以實作這個類別，插入用於加密和解密 Cookie 的不同機制。You can plug in a different mechanism for encrypting and decrypting cookies by implementing this class. 安全性狀態的編碼方式必須確保狀態已為該服務完成簽署和加密。The encoding of the security state must ensure that the state is signed and encrypted for the service. 在傳送安全性狀態做為核發給用戶端之 `SecurityContextToken` 中的 Cookie 時，伺服器會使用這個類別。This class is used by the server when sending the security state as a cookie in the `SecurityContextToken` issued to the client. 使用服務的憑證來簽署和加密安全性狀態的 `X509CertificateSecurityStateEncoder`，即是這個類別的實作範例。An example implementation of this class is an `X509CertificateSecurityStateEncoder` that uses the service's certificate to sign and encrypt the security state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract byte[] DecodeSecurityState (byte[] data);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] DecodeSecurityState(unsigned int8[] data) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function DecodeSecurityState (data As Byte()) As Byte()
protected public: abstract cli::array <System::Byte> ^ DecodeSecurityState(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ data);

returns.span: 表示安全性狀態的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array that represents the security state.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract byte[] EncodeSecurityState (byte[] data);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] EncodeSecurityState(unsigned int8[] data) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function EncodeSecurityState (data As Byte()) As Byte()
protected public: abstract cli::array <System::Byte> ^ EncodeSecurityState(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ data);

returns.span: 由編碼安全性狀態產生的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array that results from encoding the security state.
